browser.limitDescription: Focus mode active. You've reached your tab limit of 5. Close one to open another.

footer.copyright: Â© { year } Tab Limiter. Built for flow.

intelligentGuard.title: Intelligent Guard
intelligentGuard.description: Prevents new tabs from opening once you reach your custom limit, forcing you to prioritize.

focusSchedules.title: Focus Schedules
focusSchedules.description: Set strict limits during work hours and relax them for browsing sessions later in the day.

privacyCentric.title: Privacy Centric
privacyCentric.description: We never track your history. Everything runs locally on your machine for 100% privacy.

hero.title: Reclaim your focus, {highlight} at a time
hero.subtitle: Stop tab-overload from killing your productivity. Tab Limiter helps developers and students stay in the flow by intelligently managing browser clutter.
